abstract: Christopher de Bellaigue reviews book There Was and There Was Not: A Journey Through Hate and Possibly in Turkey, Armenia, and Beyond by Meline Toumani.
lead_paragraph: An Armenian-American moves to Turkey to investigate a history of tense relations.
snippet: An Armenian-American moves to Turkey to investigate a history of tense relations.

headline.main: ‘There Was and There Was Not,’ by Meline Toumani
